title: arcathomas
author: arcathomas
content: Hi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?Thanks

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?Thanksactually I also looked for this some time ago and was a little unsure too, but friends in this forum have recommended to see it on betnomi, maybe you need to see it there, I've seen it but haven't tried playing there maybe you want to try it there . hope it helps your question

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?ThanksBelieve it or not, I wanted to open the same topic these days... I'm wondering what is the best place for crypto poker, the most popular one, with a lot of players, good tournaments, and people actually sitting on cash tables, not bots.Just recently I opened Betnomi poker, and they have some nice tournaments, I even started one... but I didn't check their cash tables. There's a talk about the Betnomi poker series: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5279745.msg61433779#msg61433779... So I will probably play there for a while before I decide to check some "old names" I know. But I don't expect to see much on SwC, CoinPoker, Nitrogen, and some others... I guess those are dead places by now, or with some minimum traffic. I tried a few new casinos that offer poker, but without players at all. Anyway, I would like to see some suggestions as well...

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I'd recommend to play here: https://swcpoker.club they are far the best poker sites we've used in this forum. There are lot of other casinos out there too like Sportsbet but I don't know if they got good activity there with players anymore. Anyway, my recommendation should be just fine as there are lot of active players in there not that sure anymore since I barely visit in there these days, they use to be the go-to place for crypto poker.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on December 20, 2022, 05:25:43 PMI'd recommend to play here: https://swcpoker.club they are far the best poker sites we've used in this forum. There are lot of other casinos out there too like Sportsbet but I don't know if they got good activity there with players anymore. Anyway, my recommendation should be just fine as there are lot of active players in there not that sure anymore since I barely visit in there these days, they use to be the go-to place for crypto poker.Yeah, I remember this site, (thanks for bringing this up), but they used to be a good poker crypto based platform to begin with.But not sure how big are they (or small) as far as poker games or tournaments goes. There are old gaming platform here that still has poker, but they have a accusations before, like colluding that's why they lost their crowd.And there are also poker tournaments being held or sponsored here by members or the platform themselves.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.created_time: December 20, 2022, 05:53:33 PMLast edit: December 20, 2022, 09:15:34 PM by acroman08
comments.body: other members here might suggest you specific crypto gambling sites that offer poker room but if you want more gambling site options that offer poker room you can try visiting BTCgosu they have a list of crypto gambling sites there that has a poker room.

comments.author: Betwrong
comments.body: Quote from: iv4n on December 20, 2022, 05:21:36 PMQuote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?ThanksBelieve it or not, I wanted to open the same topic these days... I'm wondering what is the best place for crypto poker, the most popular one, with a lot of players, good tournaments, and people actually sitting on cash tables, not bots.Just recently I opened Betnomi poker, and they have some nice tournaments, I even started one... but I didn't check their cash tables. There's a talk about the Betnomi poker series: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5279745.msg61433779#msg61433779... So I will probably play there for a while before I decide to check some "old names" I know. But I don't expect to see much on SwC, CoinPoker, Nitrogen, and some others... I guess those are dead places by now, or with some minimum traffic. I tried a few new casinos that offer poker, but without players at all. Anyway, I would like to see some suggestions as well... SwC Poker is okay, I'm playing there form time to time. There are not many players there for some reason, but the site is working perfectly, and there's always at least several people at cash tables ... I personally like the site. Also, several months ago I withdrew around $1k from the site without any delays.Betnomi  is a great site for poker too. There are times when hundreds of people playing there at once. And they run lots of GTD tournaments and free rolls every day.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: iv4n on December 20, 2022, 05:21:36 PMQuote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?ThanksBelieve it or not, I wanted to open the same topic these days... I'm wondering what is the best place for crypto poker, the most popular one, with a lot of players, good tournaments, and people actually sitting on cash tables, not bots.Just recently I opened Betnomi poker, and they have some nice tournaments, I even started one... but I didn't check their cash tables. There's a talk about the Betnomi poker series: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5279745.msg61433779#msg61433779... So I will probably play there for a while before I decide to check some "old names" I know. But I don't expect to see much on SwC, CoinPoker, Nitrogen, and some others... I guess those are dead places by now, or with some minimum traffic. I tried a few new casinos that offer poker, but without players at all. Anyway, I would like to see some suggestions as well... I was very active poker player years ago as I started my online gambling in fiat poker site and poker game was also the one that made me know about cryptocurrency for the 1st time. I played in few crypto poker sites but unfortunately, the traffic is not really good in crypto poker sites compared to fiat, this is why I do not really follow the trend of crypto poker. However, for now I think there is no other good choice except swc and betnomi, I cant find any other crypto poker sites with better traffic than these 2 sites although I do not think that swc and betnomi has decent traffic.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: There are some platform where you can play at poker with bitcoin. I advice you to play poker at Betcoin.ag, or betnomi, also there are some others which is comparable to this two one. About me, I was looking for a platform where I could play with tether, it would be beautiful !

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: In the past few days I have been playing poker in Betnomi, they have a nice user interface, the tournaments are nice and the cash tables always have people. Most of the tables are for low rolling $0.01 - $0.02 tables, but some of the tables are for amounts around $50 and $100, so, you should give them a try.The only bad thing about that poker site is that we can't have multiple tables on different screens, but that isn't bad at all.

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: Guys, i don't believe you're posting a single casino each. There's so many sites with poker where you're able to pay using cryptocurrencies.  Coinplay Lucky Block CoinPoker BC.Game Cloudbet Winz.io BetOnline  Bitslot  Fortune Jack  Bovada  Chipstars Black Chip Poker Jazz Sports MyStake NitrobettingAnd this isn't even all of them, just the ones that I've found in 5 minutes of googling. I haven't tried all of them, but these sites all have decent reviews and should offer good and safe experience.

comments.author: Zackgeno96
comments.body: Difficult to give a clear answer to this. The Crypto gambling sites out there right now that offer poker are minimal. There are a number of sites where you can also play poker, but I think the number of active players on this site is minimal. If you really want to play poker, I would only find a poker site and see if you can also deposit with crypto there. I think there are few to no sites on Bitcointalk where you are going to find a large number of active poker players.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: Betwrong on December 20, 2022, 05:59:55 PMQuote from: iv4n on December 20, 2022, 05:21:36 PM...SwC Poker is okay, I'm playing there form time to time. There are not many players there for some reason, but the site is working perfectly, and there's always at least several people at cash tables ... I personally like the site. Also, several months ago I withdrew around $1k from the site without any delays.Betnomi  is a great site for poker too. There are times when hundreds of people playing there at once. And they run lots of GTD tournaments and free rolls every day.They still owe me two hats. I think I still have some tickets for those big tournaments we got from bitcointalk private series... with kids and family that game was too late for me anyway, but I tried to play it a few times and each time it was canceled, not enough registered players.I guess we can discuss "several players at cash tables", as you know there were some accusations about collusion and bots in their ANN thread. They didn't bother much to respond... I can't say that I had any issues with SWC, but somehow that place "lost spirit" (players) at one moment, and I just moved away. Maybe I will check them as well, but I am not completely sure about that.Quote from: panjul07 on December 20, 2022, 06:02:07 PMQuote from: iv4n on December 20, 2022, 05:21:36 PM......I played in few crypto poker sites but unfortunately, the traffic is not really good in crypto poker sites compared to fiat, this is why I do not really follow the trend of crypto poker. However, for now I think there is no other good choice except swc and betnomi, I cant find any other crypto poker sites with better traffic than these 2 sites although I do not think that swc and betnomi has decent traffic. Crypto poker places are miles away from fiat poker places. As I wrote, looks like Icopress and Cygan are preparing something for poker players, we will see how many interested players there will be.  Many people here talk about poker, but when it comes to playing we don't see a lot of action...https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5279745.msg61413895#msg61413895

comments.author: PawGo
comments.body: Quote from: iv4n on December 20, 2022, 07:58:34 PMCrypto poker places are miles away from fiat poker places. As I wrote, looks like Icopress and Cygan are preparing something for poker players, we will see how many interested players there will be.  Many people here talk about poker, but when it comes to playing we don't see a lot of action...https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5279745.msg61413895#msg61413895Oh, I missed that. Thanks!But I am not sure if they talk about one-time event or something more regular (or even the full-time site). Anyway, can't wait for that!Quote from: pixie85 on December 20, 2022, 07:01:45 PM Coinplay Lucky Block CoinPoker BC.Game Cloudbet Winz.io BetOnline  Bitslot  Fortune Jack  Bovada  Chipstars Black Chip Poker Jazz Sports MyStake NitrobettingI have a feeling that sites attract 'random' people, not really focused on poker.

comments.author: arallmuus
comments.body: Quote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?ThanksIf you are looking for a dedicated poker sites with crypto then currently there isnt one. Swc is probably the 'best' right now although its just so bad right now compared to their prime year. Try ggpoker though, its not exclusively crypto poker site but you can deposit there with bitcoin and the traffic there is just insane though if you like to play against large crowd

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: PawGo on December 20, 2022, 08:06:04 PMI have a feeling that sites attract 'random' people, not really focused on poker.Quote from: rhomelmabini on December 20, 2022, 05:25:43 PMI'd recommend to play here: https://swcpoker.club they are far the best poker sites we've used in this forum.I was actually looking for their name to post in another response I made just few minutes ago. It was quick I found it LOLThey used to have signature campaign and used to host regular poker tournaments for the bitcointalk forum members. It was going through for long months when the pandemic started back in Q1 2020.To response PawGo and OP, swcpoker are specialist in poker, if I ever play poker again then I will look for them before anyone else. I did not check recently but most probably blackjack.fun also have similar type of poker specialty but I could be very wrong about them. In any way, swcpoker should be the best destination to play poker with crypto.

comments.author: acroman08

I haven't tried all of them, but these sites all have decent reviews and should offer good and safe experience. the thing is, OP is looking for poker rooms(at least that is what I think he is looking for). anyway, I checked the casinos you shared and the majority of the casino you shared either has live poker or video poker. only CoinPoker, BetOnline, Bovada, Chipstars and Black Chip Poker are the only ones that have poker rooms on the list(correct me if I missed a casino on the list that has poker room)

comments.author: Riocasino
comments.body: 7XL are the biggest. this just another domain of ggpoker but they allow fast withdrawls and crypto from this domain.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.body: Quote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?ThanksHow about this?https://swcpoker.club/Annthread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5068812There are lots but this one is mostly dedicated solely on poker.Hope this helps.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: pixie85 on December 20, 2022, 07:01:45 PMGuys, i don't believe you're posting a single casino each. There's so many sites with poker where you're able to pay using cryptocurrencies.  Coinplay Lucky Block CoinPoker BC.Game Cloudbet Winz.io BetOnline  Bitslot  Fortune Jack  Bovada  Chipstars Black Chip Poker Jazz Sports MyStake NitrobettingAnd this isn't even all of them, just the ones that I've found in 5 minutes of googling. I haven't tried all of them, but these sites all have decent reviews and should offer good and safe experience. Good list already especially with Fortune jack and Chistars (these are where my friends are playing at and I think these are good poker platforms). Well, actually there should be many platforms offering the same game simply because poker is one of the traditional gambling games being offered to both online and land based casinos. It will just be comparison on platforms' promotions and bonuses as well as odds of winning, to determine where a poker player should engage himself into. Personally, I am not into this kind of gambling game but for sure there are many great gambling sites in this industry to play this game at.Quote from: arallmuus on December 20, 2022, 08:59:12 PMQuote from: arcathomas on December 20, 2022, 04:52:09 PMHi everyone,It's been a while since I played poker with crypto, back then I used betcoin.ag but they closed their poker rooms.Does anyone know a trustworthy place to play poker with crypto ?ThanksIf you are looking for a dedicated poker sites with crypto then currently there isnt one. Swc is probably the 'best' right now although its just so bad right now compared to their prime year. Try ggpoker though, its not exclusively crypto poker site but you can deposit there with bitcoin and the traffic there is just insane though if you like to play against large crowdDedicated poker sites with crypto? What does that mean? Most of the gambling sites in this industry offer and accepts cryptocurrencies as mode of payment.
